snippet.title: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous Feature trailer
snippet.description: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous is launching on Xbox One on March 1, 2022. Embark on a journey to a realm overrun by demons in a new epic RPG from the creators of the critically acclaimed Pathfinder: Kingmaker.
